targets.query: SELECT count("severity_code") FROM "syslog" WHERE ("severity" = 'info' AND "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "severity" =~ /^$severity$/ AND "appname" =~ /^$appname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

list.label: Appname
list.name: appname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=appname

list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=hostname

list.label: Severity
list.name: severity
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=severity
